      • addValidator

        public static void addValidator(IFDeployExternalValidator validator,
                java.lang.String mode)
        Add validator to registry with a given check mode. This should only be used in standalone mode. For the IDE, use the extension point (see above) for registration.
        Parameters:
        validator - the external Franca deployment model validator
        mode - the proper check mode
